original_text: In that day a man shall cast his idols of silver, and his idols of gold, which they made each one for himself to worship, to the moles and to the bats;
korean_text: 사람이 자기를 위하여 경배하려고 만들었던 은 우상과 금 우상을 그 날에 두더지와 박쥐에게 던지고

sentences.original_text: a man shall cast his idols of silver
sentences.korean_translation: 사람은 자기의 은 우상들을 던질 것이요

sentences.original_text: which they made each one for himself
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 각각 자기들을 위해 만든 것들을

sentences.original_text: to the moles and to the bats
